summary.span: 在指定的 使用線性插補，為兩個目標值之間的 屬性值建立動畫。

span.span: Animates the value of a property between two target values using linear interpolation over a specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 動畫會更新屬性值經過一段時間。An animation updates the value of a property over a period of time. 動畫效果可能會難以捉摸的例如移動幾個像素為單位向左和右，或明顯的例如同時微調並變更其色彩放大成原始大小的 200 倍的物件。An animation effect can be subtle, such as moving a a few pixels left and right, or dramatic, such as enlarging an object to 200 times its original size while spinning it and changing its color. 若要建立在動畫[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，動畫關聯物件屬性值。To create an animation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], you associate an animation with an object's property value. ## 目標值Target Values 類別會建立兩個目標值之間的轉換。The class creates a transition between two target values. 若要設定目標值，使用其， ，和屬性。To set its target values, use its , , and properties. 下表摘要說明如何， ，和屬性可能會一起或分開來決定動畫的目標值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的屬性Properties specified|產生的行為Resulting behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||動畫會從所指定的值屬性要繪製之屬性的基底值或上一個動畫輸出值，根據上一個動畫的設定方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性所指定的值為屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性設為值的總和所指定和屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||從動畫的屬性的基底值的動畫進展或上一個動畫輸出值所指定的值來屬性。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||動畫會從要繪製之屬性的基底值或上一個動畫輸出值，該值與所指定之值的總和屬性。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| > [!NOTE] > 如果您同時設定並屬性，屬性會優先和屬性會被忽略。If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他插補方法，或以動畫顯示兩個以上的目標值之間，使用物件。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. 將多個動畫套用至單一屬性的相關資訊，請參閱[主要畫面格動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md)。For information about applying multiple animations to a single property, see [Key-Frame Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md). ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features 因為類別繼承自，物件可取得數個特殊的功能，包括下列： 可以宣告為在多個物件之間共用，成為唯讀，以改善效能、 複製，而且做這些安全執行緒。Because the class inherits from , objects gain several special features, which include the following: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 如需詳細資訊，所提供的不同功能的相關物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可讓您指定的開始和結束方向的動畫顯示的模型定義的四元數。This constructor allows you to specify the quaternions that define the beginning and ending orientations of the model being animated.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of using the specified to another specified over the specified , with the specified behavior at the end of the timeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可讓您指定四元數，其定義的開始和結束方向的動畫顯示的模型，以及動畫的時刻表的行為，當它超出作用期，但其父系是在其作用時，或保留一段時間。This constructor allows you to specify the quaternions that define the beginning and ending orientations of the model being animated, as well as the behavior of the animation's timeline when it is outside of its active period but its parent is inside its active or hold period.

span.span: Gets or sets the total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.

value.span: 動畫變更其起始值所依據的總量。

span.span: The total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，當您想要以動畫顯示 「 者 」 出特定金額，而不是指定的開始或結束值的值。Use the property when you want to animate a value "by" a certain amount, rather than specifying a starting or ending value. 您也可以使用屬性與屬性。You may also use the property with the property. 下表摘要說明如何， ，和屬性可能會一起或分開來決定動畫的目標值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的屬性Properties specified|產生的行為Resulting behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||動畫會從所指定的值屬性要繪製之屬性的基底值或上一個動畫輸出值，根據上一個動畫的設定方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性所指定的值為屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性設為值的總和所指定和屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||從動畫的屬性的基底值的動畫進展或上一個動畫輸出值所指定的值來屬性。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||動畫會從要繪製之屬性的基底值或上一個動畫輸出值，該值與所指定之值的總和屬性。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| **附註**如果您同時設定並屬性屬性會優先和屬性會被忽略。**Note** If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他插補方法，或以動畫顯示兩個以上的目標值之間，使用物件。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*object* `By`=""/><*object* `By`=""/> \-或-\- or - <*物件* `By`="{[X:null 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ ><*object* `By`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage \<*object*>\<*object*> <*物件*。`By`><*object*.`By`> \< /> \\ ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽的強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

An that generates the or used by the animation.

summary.span: 計算值，這個值表示正在建立動畫之屬性的目前值，由 決定。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the .

returns.span: 屬性的計算值，由目前的動畫所決定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一個組合鏈結中，在這個值會是快照集 （如果有的話） 或基底屬性的值; 否則這個值會與鏈結中的上一個動畫所傳回的值這不是 。If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue`是基底值，如果動畫是位在第一個動畫撰寫層的屬性; 否則值會是輸出值，從上一個動畫撰寫層的屬性。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果動畫的只是其中一個其， ，或屬性集，設定這個屬性沒有任何作用。If the animation has only one of its , , or properties set, setting this property has no effect. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| > [!NOTE] > 這個相依性屬性並不常見，因為它的識別碼欄位來自，並且可由各種衍生類別共用。This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from , and is shared by various derived classes.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否在動畫重複時累加動畫值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.

value.span: 如果動畫會累加其值時其屬性造成動畫重複其簡單持續時間。

span.span: if the animation accumulates its values when its property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`true`，動畫的輸出值只會累積當動畫的屬性造成動畫重複其簡單持續時間。When this property is set to `true`, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's property causes it to repeat its simple duration. 它不會累積其值，因為其父代重複重新啟動時，或其時鐘已重新啟動從呼叫。It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a call. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| > [!NOTE] > 這個相依性屬性並不常見，因為它的識別碼欄位來自，並且可由各種衍生類別共用。This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from , and is shared by various derived classes.

The ending value of the animation.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表摘要說明如何， ，和屬性可能會一起或分開來決定動畫的目標值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的屬性Properties Specified|產生的行為Resulting Behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||動畫會從所指定的值屬性要繪製之屬性的基底值或上一個動畫輸出值，根據上一個動畫的設定方式。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性所指定的值為屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |動畫會從所指定的值屬性設為值的總和所指定和屬性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||從動畫的屬性的基底值的動畫進展或上一個動畫輸出值所指定的值來屬性。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||動畫會從要繪製之屬性的基底值或上一個動畫輸出值，該值與所指定之值的總和屬性。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| **附註**如果您同時設定並屬性屬性會優先和屬性會被忽略。**Note** If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他插補方法，或以動畫顯示兩個以上的目標值之間，使用物件。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*object* `To`=""/><*object* `To`=""/> \-或-\- or - <*物件* `To`="{[X:null 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ ><*object* `To`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage \<*object*>\<*object*> <*物件*。`To`><*object*.`To`> \< /> \\ ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

member this.UseShortestPath : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，這個布林值表示動畫是否使用球面線性插補來計算位置之間的最短弧度。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the animation uses spherical linear interpolation to calculate the shortest arc between positions.

value.span: 布林值，表示動畫是否使用球面線性插補來計算位置之間的最短弧度。
